PageDescription: ONLYOFFICE biedt een veilige online office suite die zeer goed te gebruiken is met MS Office indelingen. Verbind het met uw webplatform voor documentbewerking en samenwerking, of gebruik het als onderdeel van ONLYOFFICE Workspace.
OODocsTheMostCompleteOfficeSuite:
<0>ONLYOFFICE Docs,
het meest complete office suite
LearnMoreAboutOODocsFeatures: Meer informatie over de kenmerken van ONLYOFFICE Docs

ConvertDocsToMarkdownAndHTML: Documenten omzetten naar Markdown en HTML

ShareYourDocs: Deel uw documenten alleen voor het bekijken, bewerken, beoordelen, commentaar geven of invullen van formulieren
MakeUseOfCharacterAndParagraphLevel: Maak gebruik van samen bewerken op teken- en alineaniveau
CompareAndReviewDocsAndTrackChanges: Documenten vergelijken, beoordelen en wijzigingen bijhouden
CommunicateViaBuiltInChatOrTelegram: Communiceer via ingebouwde chat of Telegram

WhyTheGuaraLinux: Why the Guará Linux team chooses ONLYOFFICE Desktop Editors as the default office suite for 22.000 employees of the Military Police of Minas Gerais

HowCalarAltoObservatory: Hoe Calar Alto Observatory ONLYOFFICE implementeert voor veilige & locatie onafhankelijke samenwerking
GetAnswersToTheMostPopularQuestions: Get answers to the most popular questions about ONLYOFFICE
IsONLYOFFICEReallyFreeDescription:
Yes, it is. ONLYOFFICE is a free and open-source office suite distributed under the AGPL 3.0 license. The source code repositories are available on <0>GitHub.

Besides, we offer a range of free solutions that you can choose from based on your needs. These include absolutely <1>free desktop editors for Windows/Linux/macOS, <2>free mobile apps for iOS/Android, <3>the free Startup plan of ONLYOFFICE DocSpace Cloud.

Free community builds of ONLYOFFICE solutions for self-hosting can be found <4>here.
WhatIsONLYOFFICEUsedForDescription:
ONLYOFFICE provides <0>a full range of tools to create, edit and collaborate on text documents, spreadsheets, presentations, PDF forms and regular PDF files on web, desktop and mobile platforms.

You can use the online editors <1>within any business platform or opt for the room-based content collaboration platform <2>ONLYOFFICE DocSpace which already comes with the integrated editors. Besides, you are able to <3>embed the editors into your own web app.

<4>Desktop editors for working with office documents offline, as well as <5>mobile apps are also available.
IsONLYOFFICESafeToUse: Yes, it is. We <0>prioritize</0> security with robust measures. ONLYOFFICE is open-source and GDPR compliant – which means it fits all the legal criteria for data protection. ONLYOFFICE includes file encryption and multiple options for secure sharing and access control. Besides, our solutions can be deployed on private servers.
CanIUseONLYOFFICEOfflineDescription: Yes, you can. To do so, download the free <0>ONLYOFFICE Desktop Editors</0> which is available for Windows, Linux, and macOS.
NoOOIsAdFree: No, ONLYOFFICE is ad-free. We don't incorporate any external ads into our solutions.
HighlyRatedByBothCriticsAndUsers: Zeer positief beoordeeld door zowel critici als gebruikers
